title: Netherlands - Tourist/Visit Visa
visa_fee: 11,300 BDT (Embassy) + 1,117.62 BDT (VFS Service Fee) + 230 BDT (Bank Fee) + 4,000 BDT (Processing Fee) + Insurance & Notary extra

details.title: Eligibility
items: Valid Bangladeshi passport with at least 2 blank pages, valid for 3 months after leaving Schengen area
Completed and signed Schengen visa application form (Form 119031)
Clear purpose of travel for tourism or visiting friends/family
Proof of financial means (bank and credit card statements for last 6 months)
Travel insurance valid in Schengen with coverage of at least €30,000
Confirmed hotel booking and round-trip flight reservation
Employment proof or business ownership with trade license or company documents
Invitation letter from host or company (if applicable)
Civil status documents (marriage, birth, divorce, death certificates)
Consent letter and documents for minors traveling alone or with one parent

details.title: Required Documents
items: Visa application form no. 119031, completed and signed
Passport with photocopy of bio-page and all Schengen visas
One recent passport-size photo (35mm x 45mm, light background)
Cover letter explaining travel purpose addressed to the Embassy
Employer or business owner letter explaining the reason and duration of visit
Roundtrip airline reservation and travel itinerary
Health and travel insurance with minimum €30,000 coverage
Personal bank statement and credit card statement (last 6 months)
Civil status documents: marriage, divorce, death, birth certificates
Hotel reservation for the full stay
Proof of employment: company letter, salary statement, trade license, MoA
If self-employed: trade license, incorporation certificate, ITR, company bank statement
Invitation from visited company (if applicable)
Proof of recent business transactions or contracts (if applicable)
Proof of attendance and program details for trade fairs or congress (if applicable)
Parental consent and documents for minors (passport copy, financials, birth certificate)

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice.
